input.sentences: the group of friends was walking to their favorite pub .
the couple was excited to have arrived .
a lot of people were dancing and showing off their moves .
they ran into some old time friends .
they also played some games together .
output.sentences: Friends gather together to snap a quick picture before the night begins
Ron & Brittany decided to capture a picture at the first bar
The music turns up and the dancing begins!
Friends gather to take pictures of them in their costumes
While the couple next to them gets to know each other a little better
